content.question: Responses to the issues raised in the excerpt contributed most directly to the

choices.label: imposition of tighter controls over slaves in the South
emergence of a militant abolitionist movement throughout the country
growth of American support for the slave rebellion in Haiti
gradual abolition of slavery in the North

content.answer: gradual abolition of slavery in the North

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
